original_text: Then the priests and the prophets said to the officials and to all the people, “This man deserves the sentence of death, because he has prophesied against this city, as you have heard with your own ears.”
korean_text: 제사장들과 선지자들이 고관들과 모든 백성에게 말하여 이르되 이 사람은 죽는 것이 합당하니 너희 귀로 들음 같이 이 성에 관하여 예언하였음이라

sentences.original_text: Then the priests and the prophets said
to the officials and to all the people,
“This man deserves the sentence of death,
because he has prophesied against this city,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이 성읍을 거스려 예언했기 때문이라,

sentences.original_text: as you have heard with your own ears.”
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 친히 너희 귀로 들은 바와 같이라.”
